amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3801 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Considered by Senate.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which the second cloture motion on amendment SA 3801 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 66) rendered moot in Senate.
Third cloture on amendment SA 3801 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 68.
Considered by Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Third cloture motion on amendment SA 3801 presented in Senate.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which the second cloture motion on amendment SA 3801 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 66) entered in Senate.
Second cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 42. Record Vote Number: 66.
Considered by Senate.
Second cloture motion on amendment SA 3801 presented in Senate.
Upon reconsideration, cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 65.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which the motion to invoke cloture on amendment SA 3801 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 64) agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Motion to proceed to consideration of motion to reconsider the vote by which the motion to invoke cloture on amendment SA 3801 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 64) agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Considered by Senate.
Motion by Senator McConnell to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 3801 was not invoked (Record Vote No. 64) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 46. Record Vote Number: 64.
Considered by Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3801 presented in Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Considered by Senate.
Amendment SA 3801 proposed by Senator Alexander. (consideration: CR S2301) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3801 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Third cloture on amendment SA 3801 invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 2. Record Vote Number: 68.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Second cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 42. Record Vote Number: 66.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Upon reconsideration, cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 65.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3801 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 46. Record Vote Number: 64.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3801 proposed by Senator Alexander.
Senate amendment submitted
